DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Effect ALLN-177 Reducing Urinary Oxalate Patients With Hyperoxaluria Kidney Stones
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo control study evaluate efficacy ALLN 177 compare placebo reduce urinary excretion oxalate subject secondary hyperoxaluria kidney stone . ALLN-177 orally administer form oxalate decarboxylase . The goal therapy ALLN-177 reduce urinary oxalate excretion decrease absorption oxalate gastrointestinal tract . Eligible subject randomize 7 day treatment dose ALLN-177 placebo follow washout period , crossed alternate treatment . Urinary oxalate excretion assess 24-hr urine collection throughout study . The study allow 60 subject .
